column4: how do i get my nautilus desktop to automatically refresh when i save files to it?
it should do so automatically; your fam or gamin isn't working properly
cdparanoia dev=/dev/hdc foo.iso (assuming your burner is /dev/hdc, which it might or might not be, apply accordingly)
see the bittorrent/bittornado package(s), don't recall if it's installed by default
